thread.title: Fox.com Aims to Conquer Ad Avoidance With ‘MasterChef Junior’ Experiment
thread.title_full: Fox.com Aims to Conquer Ad Avoidance With ‘MasterChef Junior’ Experiment

title: Fox.com Aims to Conquer Ad Avoidance With ‘MasterChef Junior’ Experiment
text:
Suzanne.Vranica@wsj.com Updated Aug. 18, 2015 8:22 p.m. ET 
Starting this week, viewers of “MasterChef Junior” on Fox.com will be able to watch youngsters whip up their tasty creations without sitting through 10 minutes of traditional TV commercials. 
They’ll have the option of watching one 60-second interactive ad for California Milk Advisory Board before the episode begins, then go ad-free thereafter. 
The experiment signals the efforts of Fox parent 21st Century Fox and its newly... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In Popular on WSJ
